Title: A Pigeon Sat on a Branch Reflecting on Existence
Actors: Nils Westblom, Holger Andersson, Per Bergqvist, Charlotta Larsson
Plot: Sam and Jonathan, a pair of hapless novelty salesman, embark on a tour of the human condition in reality and fantasy that unfold in a series of absurdist episodes.
Production: Fonds Eurimages du Conseil de l'Europe, ZDF/Arte, Arte France Cinema, Nordisk Film & TV-Fond, Svenska Filminstitutet, 4 1/2 Film, Norsk Filmfond, Roy Andersson Filmproduktion AB, Coproduction Office, Sveriges Television, Essential Filmproduktion GmbH
